title: Till the Cows Come Home and Study for Till the Cows Come Home

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of wool on canvas, wood.

dimensions: 296 × 296 cm (116 1/2 × 116 1/2 in), 100 × 100 cm (39 3/8 × 39 3/8 in.); overall dimensions variable
credit_line: Purchased with funds provided by Helen and Charles Schwab; Major Acquisitions Centennial Fund; Wilson L. Mead Trust Fund; The Marian and Samuel Klasstorner, Laura T. Magnuson, and Simeon B. Williams endowment funds; Samuel A. Marx Fund; Wentworth Greene Field Memorial and Samuel P. Avery endowment funds
publication_history:
Iris Muuller–Westermann, Rosemarie Trockel: The Same Different, exh. cat. (Stockholm: Moderna Museet; London, Koenig Books, 2019), 14–15, cat. 3 & 4 (color ill.), 16–17 (color ill.), 30, 31, 39 165.

Manuela Hansen, Isabella Achenbach, Liv Cuniberti, Melanie Kress, Stefano Mudu, Ian Wallace, Madeline Weisburg, La Biennale do Venezia 59th International Exhibition: The Milk of Dreams/Il Latte dei Sogni, Volume I, exh. cat. (Venice: La Biennale do Venezia, 2022), 54 (color ill.).
exhibition_history:
Malmö, Sweden, Moderna Museet, Rosemarie Trockel: The Same Different, Sept. 29, 2018-Mar. 10, 2019, cat. 3 & 4.

Gwangju. South Korea, Asia Culture Center, Homo Faber: Craft in Contemporary Sculpture, Sept. 5, 2019-Feb. 23, 2020, CAT. INFO PENDING.

Paris, France, Palais de Tokyo, Elle rit (She’s laughing!), Nov. 26-Dec. 26, 2021, no cat.

59th International Art Exhibition, La Biennale di Venezia, The Milk of Dreams, Apr. 23-Nov. 27, 2022, no cat. no.
provenance_text: The artist; sold through Gladstone Gallery, New York, to the Art Institute of Chicago

input: Till the Cows Come Home and Study for Till the Cows Come Home
